sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Card = ({ giver, receiver }) => { giver.location = prettifyLocationName(giver.location); receiver.location = prettifyLocationName(receiver.location); giver.department = toCamelCase(giver.department); receiver.department = toCamelCase(receiver.department); return (

{giver.name.first + " " + giver.name.last}

{giver.motto}

{giver.email}

{giver.location} - {giver.department}

Giver

{receiver.name.first + " " + receiver.name.last}

{receiver.motto}

{receiver.email}

{receiver.location} - {receiver.department}

Receiver
) } export default Card;
